name: fox in forest
description:
help the fox to escape from the forest and collect gold coin

 use " W A S D " to walk and " spacebar " to jump (fox can do multiple jump) 

press " E " to go in door

level 1 collect 100 coin

level 2 collect 100 coin

level 3 collect 100 coin

level 4 collect 10 coin and go in the hidden door

level 5 find the door to escape from the forest

my first game 

btw I'm 10 year old
